{"model_name":"Magistral Small 2509","technical_specs":{"architecture":"Transformer-based decoder-only language model (Mistral architecture)","parameters":"1.3B","context_window":"8192 tokens","license":"Mistral AI License"},"educational_context":{"prerequisites":["Python programming","Basic machine learning concepts","PyTorch","Transformers library"],"learning_objectives":["Understand the architecture of small-scale LLMs","Learn how to load and run inference with Magistral Small","Explore fine-tuning techniques for specialized tasks"],"difficulty_level":"intermediate"},"implementation":{"setup_instructions":"pip install torch==2.0.* transformers accelerate bitsandbytes flash-attn","code_example":"from transformers import AutoTokenizer, AutoModelForCausalLM
import torch

tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained('mistralai/Magistral-Small-2509')
model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained('mistralai/Magistral-Small-2509', device_map='auto', load_in_4bit=True)

prompt = 'Once upon a time,'
input_ids = tokenizer(prompt, return_tensors='pt').input_ids.to(model.device)
output_ids = model.generate(input_ids, max_new_tokens=50)
print(tokenizer.decode(output_ids[0], skip_special_tokens=True))","best_practices":["Use GPU with at least 8GB VRAM","Enable quantization (4-bit) to reduce memory footprint","Use flash-attention for faster inference","Cache the tokenizer and model for repeated use"]},"community_resources":{"documentation_url":"https://github.com/mistralai/Magistral-Small-2509","tutorials":["https://huggingface.co/docs/transformers/model_doc/mistral","https://mistral.ai/blog/magistral-small"],"papers":["Not specified"],"repositories":["https://github.com/mistralai/Magistral-Small-2509","https://huggingface.co/mistralai/Magistral-Small-2509"]},"quality_score":85}
